metadata.title: CVE-2024-22911 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: A stack-buffer-underflow vulnerability was found in SWFTools v0.9.2, in thefunction parseExpression at src/swfc.c:2602.

criterions.comment: swftools: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
